Name: ethanolamine production | triethanolamine | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: Production from ethylene oxide and ammonia with a process yield of 95%. The inventory is based on stoechiometric calculations. The emissions to air (0.2 wt% of raw material input) and water were estimated using mass balance. The treatment of the waste water in an internal waste water treatment plant is assumed (elimination efficiency of 90% for C).;Electricity is needed to run the process auxiliaries and the wastewater treatment. Fossil fuel is needed to generate the desired heat within the process scheme.;References:;Althaus H.-J., Chudacoff M., Hischier R., Jungbluth N., Osses M. and Primas A. (2007) Life Cycle Inventories of Chemicals. ecoinvent report No. 8, v2.0. EMPA Dübendorf, Swiss Centre for Life Cycle Inventories, Dübendorf, CH.
